short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect and import data from any API to Notion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note Api Connector is a powerful, easy-to-use extension that pulls data from any API into Notion. Create your own custom connections by running custom REST API endpoints.

Note Api Connector supports the following HTTP methods: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE. You can add headers and request body parameters as JSON, form-data, or x-www-form-urlencoded.

Preview API responses in an easy-to-read tabular format and refine your data import to ensure that only the most relevant information is transferred to Notion.
